Art Walk Weekends image preparation tool

Fully client-side image processing app. Users enter their artist name,
upload 5 images, the app validates/processes them in-browser via Canvas
API, and provides individual or bulk downloads as optimised JPEGs.

Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and HEIC input formats with lazy-loaded
heic-to library for HEIC conversion.

EOF
\)")
